changelog.releases:
1.11.0 November 2016 https://dev.blazingcache.org/jira/secure/ReleaseNote.jspa?projectId=10000&version=10104 BlazingCache 1.11.0 introduces SASL/Kerberos authentication
1.10.0 September 2016 https://dev.blazingcache.org/jira/secure/ReleaseNote.jspa?projectId=10000&version=10101 BlazingCache 1.10.0 introduces CacheClient.load() feature
1.9.0 June 2016 https://dev.blazingcache.org/jira/secure/ReleaseNote.jspa?projectId=10000&version=10009 BlazingCache 1.9.0 introduces JCache JSR107 support for StoreByReference optional feature
1.8.0 May 2016 https://dev.blazingcache.org/jira/secure/ReleaseNote.jspa?projectId=10000&version=10007 BlazingCache 1.8.0 is a GA release
1.7.0 April 2016 https://dev.blazingcache.org/jira/secure/ReleaseNote.jspa?projectId=10000&version=10006 BlazingCache 1.7.0 introduces fetchObject, getObject and putObject methods
1.6.0 26 March 2016 https://dev.blazingcache.org/jira/secure/ReleaseNote.jspa?projectId=10000&version=10005 BlazingCache 1.6.0 introduces fetch/put/invalidate serialization s
1.5.0 1 March 2016 https://dev.blazingcache.org/jira/secure/ReleaseNote.jspa?projectId=10000&version=10004 BlazingCache 1.5.0 introduces detailed performance counters
1.4.0 26 January 2016 https://dev.blazingcache.org/jira/secure/ReleaseNote.jspa?projectId=10000&version=10003 BlazingCache 1.4.0 introduces distributed locks
1.3.0 21 January 2016 https://dev.blazingcache.org/jira/secure/ReleaseNote.jspa?projectId=10000&version=10001 BlazingCache 1.3.0 introduces JSR107 API, first public release
